body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our Customer Support team. My name is Joe Russell and I work for SecureDrive, a leading security solutions provider.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Dorothy Lewis.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Dorothy. Can you please provide me with your date of birth for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is the twenty fifth of May, nineteen eighty seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Dorothy. And for added security, could you also confirm the first four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the first four digits of my phone number are eight zero zero seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Dorothy, for providing that information. We appreciate your cooperation in keeping your account secure.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Dorothy. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
